@nkoenig: I don't see adding a "Model modification is currently disabled" message as resolving the issue of the is_static checkbox having no effect ... I mean it does have an effect now indeed, but a warning message was not the desired effect that this checkbox should have.

Disabling even the ability to change the mass of objects is very bad. I would prefer my terminal to be spammed with fake error messages than not being able to modify an object at all.

Removing features does not resolve their bugs - it just adds bugs because it removes needed functionality.
